author: Joey D'Urso
title: A "Virtual Concert" On Facebook Became A Daily Flood Of Positive Lockdown Vibes
description: "The feed underneath would go to 1,000 comments, and it’d be just all ‘hi, how are you, you’re not alone’." View Entire Post ›
content: A Facebook group set up last week for some musicians to perform remotely under lockdown has exploded in size and is now inundated by daily selfies, animal pictures and positive comments from people around the world staying indoors because of the coronavirus.… [+3052 chars]
